Package org.daisy.paper

Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement papers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Dimensions  
Paper Provides an interface for common properties of a Paper.
PaperFilter Provides an interface for filtering a collection of Papers.
PaperProvider Provides an interface for a collection of Papers.
 

Class Summary
DefaultPaper  
DefaultPaperCatalog Provides a default PaperCatalog that will add all available PaperProviders
PageFormat Provides the page format to use when embossing
PaperCatalog Provides a catalog of Paper factories.
 

Enum Summary
PageFormat.Orientation The width/height orientation of the page
Paper.Shape The shape of the paper in the most commonly used orientation
 

Package org.daisy.paper Description

Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement papers.
